title: Ask an Australian about the outdoors [Turkish version]
creator_credit: Artransa Park Studios and Kay Roberts
brief_description: A family setting out on a picnic prepare by taking adequate food, water and first aid equipment. The danger of fire in the bush is emphasised, and the film also stresses the need to protect the fauna. Note: In Turkish.
